name: Mini Life
description:
Mini life is a city life simulation game. Made with scratch. Now I'm working on Kiotbo, which I can count as the renewed version of mini life (and yes, I do it with scratch too because my facilities are not enough) but I put mini life here, because why not! The controls are a bit weird because...uhh I don't know lmao. I did this about 2 years ago. Anyway, if you're going to play, the controls are as follows;
E - interaction
Q - mostly exit something
Z - weigh in
O - getting game save code
L- game save load 
D + Q - undress
Q + R - quit room 
C - cellphone open/close
J - I don't remember what this did
thats all i hope you can play!
